articles.content:

articles.title: OnePlus' new screen knows where you're touching it, even when it's wet - The Verge
articles.description: The upcoming OnePlus Ace 2 Pro, releasing in China on August 16th, uses a special chip to algorithmically determine where you’re touching it, even when it’s wet.
